mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by board_id desc ) as rnum , tb.* from ( select board_id , board_type , board_title , board_contents , url , created_id , DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime , updated_id , DATE_FORMAT(updated_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_datetime from tb_board where board_id like concat(#{id},'%') )tb where 1 = 1
